DOC.criteria: Previous participation RAD study laboratory RAD study inclusion criterion : 18+ year age Fluent literate English Can provide informed consent fMRI scan eligibility , include evidence form metal embed body ( e.g. , metal wire , nut , bolt , screw , plate , suture ) Anyone already complete RAD study exclude .
